section.title: Apache Ant
section.screen: cd /usr/local/src wget http://mirror.bjtu.edu.cn/apache//ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.8.1-bin.tar.gz tar zxvf apache-ant-1.8.1-bin.tar.gz mv apache-ant-1.8.1 /usr/local/ cd .. ln -s apache-ant-1.8.1 apache-ant

section.title: source code
section.screen: cd /usr/local/src wget http://labs.renren.com/apache-mirror//ant/ivy/2.2.0/apache-ivy-2.2.0-bin.tar.gz tar zxvf apache-ivy-2.2.0-bin.tar.gz mv apache-ivy-2.2.0 /usr/local/ cd .. ln -s apache-ivy-2.2.0 apache-ivy

section.title: apt-get
section.screen: $ sudo apt-get install ant $ sudo apt-get install ivy
